explains: n. 部分，方面；（宝石的）琢面，刻面；（构成昆虫或甲壳动物复眼的）小眼面

sentences.en: Now let's look at another facet of the problem.
sentences.cn: 现在咱们看问题的另一面。

sentences.en: The caste system shapes nearly every facet of Indian life.
sentences.cn: 种姓制度几乎决定了印度生活的各个方面。

sentences.en: The information revolution will touch every facet of composition, publication, distribution, and reading.
sentences.cn: 信息革命将涉及写作、出版、发行和阅读的方方面面。
